column5: I'm leaving for Restoule in a couple days and I want to rent a motor for at least a day. I will have my old Johnson but would like to take the wife and kids for at least 1 day trip exploring via boat. Needless to say I NEED something reliable. Anybody know of a place on the lake or on the way where I can rent one?
Martin's camp, Bing will rent out outboards. Also Mill Bay Marina should have some also.
This is what this site is all about  Albert is kind enough to lend me his motor for the week and bowslayer has given me more info on Restoule than I could ever imagine!  Thanks guys
